Reference

  • RiTa index
Class

Grammar

Name

fromJSON
Description Creates a new grammar object from a JSON string
Example 
rg = Grammar.fromJSON(grammarRules);
Parameters
Stringa JSON representation of the grammar
Object
(or Map in Java)		the context for any referenced variables or functions (optional)
Returns
Grammarthis Grammar object
Related tmp_related
Note tmp_note
Syntax 
Grammar.fromJSON(grammarRules);
Grammar.fromJSON(grammarRules, context);
Platform Java / JavaScript
